title: TALK OF THE TOWN: Girlfriend of X-Men actor James McAvoy is seen wearing a wedding ring
text:
Are congratulations in order for X-Men actor James McAvoy? James’s director pal Jamie Lloyd seems to think he has secretly married his girlfriend Lisa Liberati… and she’s been seen wearing a wedding ring.

Glasgow-born James first met Lisa when he filmed the movie Split in Philadelphia two years ago and they’ve been together ever since.

They were spotted back in the city recently – and this time she was wearing a wedding band.

Mr and Mrs? James with Lisa, clearly sporting a ring on her wedding finger

Lisa (left) is a production assistant for M. Night Shyamalan who directed James in Split which is how the couple first met. James, 40, was married at the time to actress Anne-Marie Duff (right), but was in the process of separating from her after 11 years of marriage.

Lisa is a production assistant for M. Night Shyamalan who directed James in Split which is how the couple first met. James, 40, was married at the time to actress Anne-Marie Duff, but was in the process of separating from her after 11 years of marriage.

Two months after the divorce was finalised, Lisa, 40, and James went ‘Instagram official’ – posting a number of revealing pictures of themselves at a fancy dress party.

Jamie, the director of James’s upcoming West End play Cyrano de Bergerac, was overheard at David Suchet’s party in London last week describing how Lisa visits him often during rehearsals. He referred to Lisa as James’s ‘wife’ and said they married ‘recently’.

Jamie could be wrong, but I hope not – friends of James say she makes him very happy.

A spokesman for James declined to comment. Maybe they haven’t seen the pictures!

Look out, Cillian Murphy – Alastair Campbell wants to hire you! The former Labour spin doctor saw this cardboard cut-out of Cillian playing the TV show’s Tommy Shelby at the BBC’s Birmingham building.

And after donning a flat cap, Alastair, right, said on Instagram: ‘Got to love the way they’re using the Peaky Blinders phenomenon – wouldn’t mind to have Tommy Shelby in the Labour whips office right now.’

Sounds like Alastair hasn’t really bought into Jeremy Corbyn’s plan for ‘a kinder, gentler politics’...
description: TALK OF THE TOWN: Glasgow-born James McAvoy and Lisa Liberati were spotted back in the city recently - and this time she was wearing a wedding band.
authors: Charlotte Griffiths For The Mail On Sunday
